pageContext.claim: “Great job by @elonmusk in agreeing to build, in TEXAS, what is expected to be the largest auto plant anywhere in the world. He kept his word to me. Texas & @Tesla are big winners. MADE IN THE USA!”
pageContext.analysis: Nope, the biggest car plant in the world is Volkswagen's massive facility in Wolfsburg, Germany, and Tesla and its operations and this project in Texas pale in comparison.
